website_summaries.verdict: An affordable seatpost replacement meant specifically for mountain bike frames.
pros: Modern design features a simple clamp that is compatible with most mountain biking seats
Comes in different sizes for the perfect frame fit
cons: Seat clamp may start to squeak after heavy use on rough trails

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, weak post
customer_reviews.text: I went riding for 20 mins on my MTB and I started to feel something weird on this new seat post. I checked it out and it started to bend. I decided to turn back and the bend only got worst. I had the post on position 8, far from the minimum insertion point. I'm 225 lbs but I was only doing fire roads, no single trails. Terrible product, returning
customer_reviews.author: Steven T.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it till it started to get squeaky at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it till it started to get squeaky at the seat clamp. still works fine with no actual wiggle etc, but feels like it'll eventually fail or is the result of bad design. The seat is not the culprit since it used to be on a better post and never squeaked. The post is holding up fine so far, but its on a bike that is not my daily driver. Update, still hasn't worsened nor improved, still works fine several months later and I'm riding on it more often as well.
customer_reviews.author: Grand n' Huge

customer_reviews.title: It’s as long as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about how long it would be . I had one for 2 years that was only 13-14 inches and it wasn’t long enough. This one is definitely more length than I need but that’s what I wanted . Got it today and installed it with pliers and Allen key in 10 minutes. Took it for a ride ....awesome. It deserves 6 stars . It won’t go all the way down into the bike because it’s so long , so if you are not the only rider of the bike it might pose a problem for the shorter rider who wants to adjust it to their height
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN G

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.text: My existing Specialized seatpost had a two screw system. The screws were too thin and eventually would break. So even though the two screw system is better for adjustments, I can’t trust them anymore. This seat post is longer, lighter, and looks better than the more expensive one it replaces. I like the single chunky strong looking screw that holds the seat on. It’s not as adjustable, but it does the job better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My bike has a lot of rust on the inside, so when I inserted the bike post it came out all covered in rust flakes that broke off from the bike itself. However, after I wiped the rust off, I noticed that the post itself was not even scratched. Finish seems of really good quality. I have my bike seat at an angle, and the seat bracket that comes with the post allowed for easy adjustment and held firmly once tightened. Very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Z.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a man 6'6 tall, comfortable riding now.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this extra long seatpost for my husband's bike. He's about 6'5-6'6 and about 370 lbs. Very long legged and definitely needed a boost so that he sits up higher and didn't feel so bent over. He says everything works great, easy to install, zero problems, and now he can sit upright and rest comfortably for longer rides.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the length of seatpost. Great quality and finishing. I have replaced my old seatpost since I wanted to attach a baby seat which required more space underneath the seat. I didn't take the unboxing pics but I have a picture of the box and pics of bike after installing the seatpost (high & low both). It fits perfectly. I recommend this product, its too good for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Mamoon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am generally pleased with the extra long seat post. I gives me the height that I needed to ride my Raleigh Venture trail bike comfortably. One problem I did encounter was the need to retighten the bolt that secures the seat to the seat post. Otherwise it would eventually loosen after a few rides. This is a minor inconvenience to me so I would say this seat post is still a good purchase for the price overall.
customer_reviews.author: David Charles Duran

customer_reviews.title: I love the how the seat connects to the post
customer_reviews.text: I love the how the seat connects to the post; the rails sit in grooves secured by a single bolt. Much more convenient than adjusting two nuts to secure it. Too, adjusting the seat is much easier with the micro-adjustment than with the standard seat post. I bought one for each of our bikes. A superior product without a huge price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Ride On, Ride Taller in LA
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add some height to my bike seat to accommodate my leg length. This light weight post had high ratings. I ran it by a professional cyclist pal, and he said it looks to be a great option! It also looks good with my blue bike as an added bonus! If you’re in the LA area and need bike repair or modifications, be sure to check out Ride On Bike Co-op in Leimert Park! They installed it for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight long seatpost worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I prefer smaller frames to gain strength and rigidity, but I need extra-long seatposts. This UPANBIKE post is lightweight, seems pretty strong, gives me a LOT of extra room to adjust the seat height, and allows for good front-rear movement of the seat. I've been using it on my Fuji road bike for a while now, and can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: pstaffor

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and is well made
customer_reviews.text: I needed a longer seat post to give extend the life of a bike another year or two. This one was a fraction of the price as what the local bike store wanted; they actually recommend I look on Amazon for the part. This one is well made and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nomine

customer_reviews.title: It is long but...
customer_reviews.text: It bent after 2 months. In all fairness this is my second post that bent, so it may be my fat butt and not a reflection of the product. The other post to bend was a stock post and I was hoping this longer one would prevent that. It did not. I also did not care for flange and how the bike seat secured to the post. The bolt was not adequate so I had to modify it to fit. Not going to order again.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: I'm a bit heavy for it, but it's bent after only a month.
customer_reviews.text: I am ~250lb and i usually have a ~15lb backpack when going to college and after a month of somewhat regular usage there is a noticable curve. Someone slimmer with less to carry would probably find this a fine product...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of garbage. I've ridden it three times on city streets that are completely smooth and it is already bent do not waste your money on it. I am an average size man at 6 foot 1 185 lb
customer_reviews.author: VicMizzy

customer_reviews.title: The extra length allow me to have a better leg extension when I ride
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my other 27.2 tube for my old carbon Trek MTB. The extra length allow me to have a better leg extension when I ride. I do more street and path riding now with my daughter, so I don't expect to stress this on any trails to test the strength.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for and the size fit perfectly. And easy to attach railed seat to this post. Came with the L-shaped Allen wrenches needed for installing.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStar

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my scooter
customer_reviews.text: I need a seat and a seatpost. very light weight fits my scooter perfectly and the seat fits right on it. The seatpost is very sturdy. I not sure but I think the post lets you tilt the seat I havent tried yet but im sure it can.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a 350mm seat post for my folding electric bike. Feels solid and slides easily. This adds more height to allow taller riders to ride comfortably. A good find!
customer_reviews.author: David M Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Tendency to get loose, otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: It tends to get loose at the top. I have started carrying the correct Allen key for those occasions. I might try some LocTite red if I still have some around.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought an e-bike that is kind of a one-size-fits-all frame. I am tall, so I quickly realized I was going to need a longer seat post. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Probably not good for heavier riders
customer_reviews.text: This seat post bent after a couple of rides even though the post was inserted several inches past the minimum insertion line. I'm on the heavier side (200 lbs) so if your a lighter rider this post may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ALLEN WRENCH PROVIDED IS TOO SMALL FOR THE NUT AND BOLT TO CONNECT TO SEAT.
customer_reviews.text: The wrench provided is too small to skrew in the bolt to attach to bike. Irritating. Had to go buy one that fits. Appreciate that tool is provided.
customer_reviews.author: Tabascoroni

customer_reviews.title: Basic, does exactly what it's designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing special. It's just a bike seat post. It allows a taller rider to make use of a smaller frame. If you have the choice you should still get the frame that is sized right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to extend the life of my daughter's Trek Bike - this did the trick. She's still able to ride it and the stem is stong enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: A must for tall guys
customer_reviews.text: This new post made my bike so much more comfortable. Easy to install, strong and after 2 months I would say durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Hurtte

customer_reviews.title: Used on Mongoose Malus.
customer_reviews.text: The seat post works fine and I wouldn't say it's for less weight. I definitely like it due to the one Alan screw to hold the seat on.
customer_reviews.author: Myles B Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement, adds inches to the bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy replacement, very long. Made our son's bike big enough for him when he hit 5'10".
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Chen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Long and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great seat post for taller individuals. I had a standard 11" steel post that was not tall enough for me to ride comfortably, and this post did the trick. Not heavy for its length. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ECo1SG

customer_reviews.title: It is a long seat post
customer_reviews.text: If you want a long seat post, that's what this is. Not a lot to say -- looks good, seems sturdy, no problems in the tube, mounting the seat, or when riding.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Barouch

customer_reviews.title: Made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.text: Huge difference and definitely a better post for tall people.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi'

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It exactly what I needed to extend smaller bike to work for taller biker.
customer_reviews.author: Grigoriy Yasinov

customer_reviews.title: Great seatpost for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality seatpost that fits better than the original post I replaced. Good finish, strong clamp and one of the few that came in a length long enough to provide a suitable height range.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Super Light & Strong Aluminum!
customer_reviews.text: This 24.5 dia. seat stem fits Perfectly into the bike frame and the stem length adjusts fine for my 6’1” height. The 6061 T6 aluminum is very strong & very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Bill and Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Exactly what I was looking for. Now I can get that extra inch of height on my saddle that really makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall people
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a tall person with long legs. I like the markings on the post to give you a precise reference for positioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long delivery
customer_reviews.text: To long to deliver. Now to cold to ride. Also, post tube is not heavy wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Haines

customer_reviews.title: Extra length and seat angle is great
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent seat post. It is extra long and has angular adjustment of bike seat. It is very well built. I was able to optimize my seat position
customer_reviews.author: nothing but the truth

customer_reviews.title: Don't try to return it!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't return incorrect sized post. I bought the right one and I'm satisfied with that but seller wouldn't help me with the return when the barcode was determined by UPS to be invalid. Very frustrating and I'm out $25.
customer_reviews.author: David Starrett

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great on my bike. No concerns with it, it is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: could not have asked for more, the local shops are a joke, thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: It fit my Schwinn
customer_reviews.text: It allowed m e to raise the seat so I can fully extend my legs. This is important for blood flow on long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Klavs Landberg

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! It Broke.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after less than 500 miles of hard riding. My butt didn't like it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Setzer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight i make the clamp this seat post slides down during the ride and is super annoying. Returning as soon as I get a new post.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Got it and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a previous model of this seat post that had developed a structural flaw. This model is slightly different design in the area of concern. Arrived right on time!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kym Smith

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The seat post bent but I did not initially notice it. Now outside return window. Total junk which could damage your bike. Do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Bent in 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Looked great out of the box. Installed easy. Bent like a banana after 20 minutes of moderate riding. What is this made out of, pot metal?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved $11 dollars over the bicycle shop price
customer_reviews.text: Received Quickly and it was a perfect fit! Now I am riding again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a sit on nanrobot scooter which I also bought on amazon but had a very low seat. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Spiro

product_meta.title: UPANBIKE Bike Bicycle MTB Replacement Extra Long Seatpost Seat Post 17.7inch (450mm) φ 25.4 27.2 28.6 30.4 30.9 31.6mm
feature_bullets: Important note: real measure of the seatpost diameter is a little smaller than the number marks on it. e.g.:25.4mm one may measures about 25.0~25.2mm only
Extra long: 17.7" (45cm); Help to raise height of saddle, so that tall rider don't have to bent much forward
Replacement seatpost for most bike, mountain bike, road bike, universal bikes
Clamp is adjustable for the saddle tilt angle

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
